person.persName: John B. Stivers (Bourbon co. carpenter/ 7th Infantry US)

body.p: North Middletown, Kentucky, postmaster. Clay County, Kentucky, native. Served in the 3rd Regiment of Kentucky Volunteer Infantry during the Mexican-American War. Member of the Masonic order. Carpenter in Bourbon County, Kentucky, in 1860. Second Lieutenant in the 7th Kentucky Volunteer Infantry Regiment (U.S.A.) from August 19, 1861 to August 2, 1863.
